subsection.name: 4.1 Create New Project
subsection.p: Prerequisites. Start CayenneModeler as described earlier.
Start New Project. Select "File -> New Project" menu item or click on new project icon:
From a list of project types displayed select "Create Application" (the only one available now). A new project will be created.

Create New DataDomain. First thing to create in a new project is a new DataDomain. Most projects will only have a single DataDomain. Select "Project -> Create DataDomain" menu item or click on new domain icon:
After the domain is created, you can assign it any name you want instead of the default "UntitledDomain1".

Save New Project. When saving a new project you will be prompted to specify location. Main project file, "cayenne.xml", will be saved in a directory that you choose. Locations of project DataMap and DataNode files will be relative to the main project directory.
